pros: Nice collaborative work environment and better than some other HCA facilities in other parts of the state. Pleasant staff in my department. Cerner charting is a plus. Reimbursement for higher education.
cons: Parking situation isn’t great. Lots of construction projects going on so certain parts of the hospital are blocked off. Elevators are constantly broken or slow.

pros: Good place to work Fair pay Friendly environment
cons: High turnover Some managers play favorites

job_title: PCT Patient Care Tech in Inverness, FL
pros: Great benefits, doctors are amazing to work beside
cons: Pay isn't that great. Employees talk to you how ever they want to. Very stressful job, management never seems to be around because their to caught up in their own work to actually see how the floor is run. Patients aren't being taken care of the way their supposed to be because of understaffed.

review_title: Worst few years of my life
job_title: Food Service Worker in Inverness, FL
pros: It was nice to help the community.
cons: The schedule was insane. 13 hour days. Could work from seven am to seven forty five pm five days a week, and they would try to get you to work the other 2 days. Unfair place to work. Favoritism.

pros:

pros: Some of the Staff are great to work with.

review_title: It is a pretty good job.
pros: Fellow employees and great people who care about patients. Most of the employees are respectful of each other and in most cases put the patients as a top priority.
cons: It is overwhelming at times with the limitations on resources.  Sometimes the pressure is very high to work faster and management doesn't realize that it could open us up for mistakes that could effect patient care.  Much of oue equipment is 10+ years old  and it is hard to get it replaced with newer and more modern equipment.

review_title: Too many chiefs, not enough Indians
pros: Fellow nurses, for the most part, were awesome!  It was the best part of working there.  Nurse to patient ratio 6:1.  Acuity was not factored into patient load.
cons: Management.  Pay.  Always seemed to be short staffed.   CNA's were usually left with half the floor (20 pts) and nurses with their full loads would have to pick up the slack.  Left for unsafe conditions for the patients.

review_title: Need to revamp management.  Too many cliques.  Management involved with gossip  lead to discipline of staff.
pros: Coworkers were great, benefits were ok
cons: Management focuses too much on negative. Work load is very heavy and unsafe.  No room for advancement unless you have no experience then you get priority

review_title: Citrus Memorial needs to embrace change.
pros: Great benefits package and time off.
cons: Management is adverse to change. Very narrow-minded when it comes to new, challenging ideas.

pros: Great company to work for job is easy
cons: Pay is very low, Supervisors should be required to attend leadership training to learn how to deal with employees

pros: I think it was a friendly great work environment
cons: hours not great includes evening and weekends

job_title: Marketing and Public Relations Manager in Inverness, FL
cons: Hospital administration was terrible from the top down. No looking toward the future. No accountability. Just "keep doing things the way we always have."

job_title: Pharmacy Technician CPhT in Inverness, FL
pros: Benefits and vacation away from there
cons: Extremely negative and hostile work environment and violations of privacy
